Reviews.Content: choice hotels booked finding comparable hotel becoming reserved park south hotel advertised rating reasonable price pleased visit weekend evenings jazz performed restaurantbar music excellent seating intimate performance free drinks required served delicious musicians approachable personable instead venturing day city delightful treat sit relax street unlike hotels remove continental breakfast 900 1000 park south offered complimentary breakfast 1100 food fine especially enjoyed sitting tables patio outside watch people passing balcony extended lobby provided assortment books borrow peruse desk staff remarkably helpful friendly witty recommended restaurants walking distance hotel provided requested information nearby elongated cramped poor lighting cast shadows daylight view tall brick walls outside window blocked sun closet accommodate suitcase luggage stand available television listing provided complaints definitely stay park south hotel

Reviews.Title: “great priced hpotel in superb location”
Reviews.Author: bonhoff37
Reviews.Content: spent absolute age trying decent priced accomadation midtown manhattan finally park south hotel park returned trip city hotel location friendly staff nice breakfast decent price queen fit 2 snugly werent stay instead roam city day night hotel met hotel 5 outta 5 holiday beautifull weather helped read bad review hotel reviewer hotel honest opinion staying thats compliment

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, classy”
Reviews.Author: MattG78
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect clean bed hair firm firm soft sagging pillows couple staff helpful questions allowed checkin couple hours breakfast definitely average continental fare subway station steps entrance highly recommend hotel balance value comfort
